content: Place roundabout (4x4) at y=0, centered roughly at [5,0,5]
Place ground-level roads connecting to and extending from roundabout
Place Elevated Road 1 (S-curve overpass) at y=1, starting East, looping North/West/South, and descending West/South of the roundabout.
Place additional ground-level roads and intersections as seen in the image.
Connect the elevated road descent to ground level.
Verify all placements and rotations against the image.
